title: Rek'sai is being kha'zix'ed
body:
Tunnel (Burrowed E) [cooldown increased to 26/24/22/20/18 from 20/19.5/19/18.5/18

nerfed just because of lcs.

replies.body: Welcome to the club {{champion:429}} {{champion:268}}
those are also part of the holy trinity of cancer {{champion:268}}  {{champion:157}}  {{champion:429}}

> [{quoted}](name=specter424,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=0KEdAtJk,comment-id=00000001,timestamp=2016-08-15T22:43:48.153+0000)
>
> those are also part of the holy trinity of cancer {{champion:268}}  {{champion:157}}  {{champion:429}}

I don't know how you compare those 2 to yasuo of all champions. Yas has a shield, can block any projectile for his whole team, can build 1 crit item then go full tank with tri force, has an insane amount of mobility, gets free armor pen, has a AoE knockup and can easily solo carry games. Both Kali and Azir are extremely team reliant, with Kalista you need a good support or its GG and with Azir you need a solid frontline to keep assassins from deleting you.
they want to keep all the fanboiz happy...yas is op with that kit.  I like him as a champ but too many people play him (whether good or bad) and that just gets old.
yasuo isn't even really OP or unfair, people cry about some seriously dumb shit imo
Yas is overloaded for what he should be.

in terms of inputs, like you aren't able to play him without a lot of practice, sure. in terms of output, not really. he has a really specific mobility strength case around minion waves, a utility spell, and a knockup. that isn't that crazy.
Let's be honest, it's only "insane" when in the middle of an enemy minion wave, and even then only every 6 seconds at rank 5.
{{champion:2}} i remember that he was nerfed due to voyboy while he had 49% win rate in ranked queue.
When Olaf was used with Righteous Glory , didn't they nerf Olaf, alongside a bunch of other champs, and then nerf Righteous Glory without reverting the nerfs (a la Sejuani and Cinderhulk)?

> [{quoted}](name=L0RD AZIR,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=0KEdAtJk,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-08-15T22:32:50.243+0000)
>
> Welcome to the club {{champion:429}} {{champion:268}}

Odd... Kalista, Azir, and Rek'Sai were released all close together. I'm sure that can't be a coincidence.

6 seconds. 6 more fucking seconds at rank 1. 

WTF.
kha'zix is fine right now though?

Well old kha'zix WAS pretty different, and even if kha'zix right now is strong and good, he's nowhere near the old kha'zix. 

Q- 45% more damage when isolated, (no evo), 425 isolation range. You didn't even need to evolve this to delete people. This was when instagibin' and damage creep wasn't something. Evolved? Tank'zix wasn't cool. missing % health damage. Enough said. over 2.0+ ad scaling isolated.

W- Lower cd, when evolved this thing applied passive. Basically even more free damage, crazy wave clear and poke. You used to max this first in the mid lane. Also you could use this mid air, which is basically animation cancelling. 

E- 80% ad scaling. This shit in the old days did damage. 

R- 50% damage reduction during it. Nuff said. But guess what. You didn't evolve this shit cause WEQ was much better.
45% more damage when isolated? his Q currently chunks squishies for 70% of their hp and has a low fucking cooldown.
THat was unevolved and before the nerfs. You didn't need to evolve q to deal shitloads of damage. He used to be a laner thanks to old w till riot shit on that skill.
Rather have Kha'zix top than the top lane meta dominated by Jayce.. God the EQ..
well in the top lane he's squishy but his all ins are really good at level 3 and 6.
Also, the duration when upgrading the ult was *still* 1 second. It's one of the things I still miss, having the 1 second stealth bursts.
Yeah, I forgot mentioning that.
i think so, just remembered how his W damage and cooldown were nerfed in season 4 or 5 because he was picked in lcs.

> [{quoted}](name=Sona x Rubick,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=0KEdAtJk,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2016-08-15T22:42:58.888+0000)
>
> i think so, just remembered how his W damage and cooldown were nerfed in season 4 or 5 because he was picked in lcs.

It was in March 2014. Only three months after I started playing. I have feint memories of playing Kha'Zix before that. Sadly, I never got enough IP to play him before his E was nerfed. I was confused on how my friend was doing so much damage with that cool leap attack. Also, I never knew the reason he was nerfed was because of LCS, so thanks for the information. Sad to see this happening to Rek'Sai, though.
Since his evolved W got him pentas, he was an aoe assassin that would delete you if you were alone.

Look at her winrate on probuilds.
Yeah, 60%.
He's good in pro play and high ELO, she deserves nerfs.
link?
http://probuilds.net/champions/details/RekSai
urgot 57% win rate, can't wait for the nerf

> [{quoted}](name=Sona x Rubick,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=0KEdAtJk,comment-id=000c000000000000,timestamp=2016-08-16T13:04:01.591+0000)
>
> urgot 57% win rate, can't wait for the nerf

And then you compare pickrates.
Please.
Lmao, get off the bandwagon and realize reksai deserves nerfs.
This was why Kha was nerfed: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1kh2Cv7__eo
that was during his strongest patch, i'm talking about a nerf around season 4/season 5

So we going to ignore the 14k gold lead Kha'Zix's team had. 

Sure he was pretty damn strong but come on, nearly any champion with a reset could do that with that type of a gold lead.

He reliably got that lead though.  That isn't a video of an isolated incident it was very frequent.  I saw a couple of games where a Kha got a penta in about 5 seconds with almost no gold lead.  Yes it took skill but kha played right would delete teams quickly back in the day.
Fair enough I guess lol, you're right on that end.

Back in ye olden days when most of you were still in your diapers, Kha'Zix got gutted so hard that he was considered the most useless champ in existence. I believe it was somewhere in Season 4 or 5 where his Isolation was so garbage it might as well not exist. Of course he's better now, but it's like saying Olaf'd. It means being gutted into something more worthless than an used condom.

Well people called him trash, but he wasn't exactly trash. He lost his

Q- Missing % health damage, unevolved became much weaker, but his evolved damage became much greater.
W-can't be used mid air, no longer applies passive when evolved.
E- 20% ad scaling instead of 80.
R- 2 seconds 3 times instead of 50% reduced damage during it.

That's pretty much what he lost.

no i believe he means patch 4.9, where Kha's Q got gutted so hard it dealt less dmg than an auto at rank 1. 

There were other changes, but thats what he means 

I hated that patch 

{{champion:121}} Main
Wat, q deals less damage than one auto? that's crazy shit right there ;-;
Yea, even with full ad marks it dealt no damage, they buffed it in a later patch which made his w max competitive.
wow that's some crazy gutting.

I think it was only when he had less than a certain amount of AD at rank 1 (the AD threshold w took till early-midgame to reach). Anyways, out was even harder to jungle and clear with him then. Lee Sin being really popular didn't help. And yeah, top Zix couldn't compete with anything.
I guess yeah.

nah bro kha zix is  one of the best assasins  atm  
bad example i guess
was still nerfed because of lcs.
I think Azir'd is a better term
wtf are you talking about? I destroy games as Kha'zix, hes not under-powered
i didn't say the opposite.

> [{quoted}](name=xXUkarozXx,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=0KEdAtJk,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2016-08-15T23:18:57.255+0000)
>
> wtf are you talking about? I destroy games as Kha'zix, hes not under-powered

I think we're talking about what happened to Kha in the past

{{champion:266}} {{champion:268}} {{champion:245}} {{champion:429}} {{champion:90}} (still strong but got nerfed){{champion:13}} {{champion:136}} {{champion:83}} {{champion:203}} 

Let's say: {{champion:421}} , welcome to the club!

well ekko is okay, and aatrox...

wait they made yorick red? wtf rito?

You can always tell the difference between a League noobie and a League veteran by how they react to their favorite champs being played in LCS.

* Noobie: "Oh boy! The pros are playing with my favorite champ and winning! This is so exciting!"

* Veteran: "Oh god! The pros are playing with my favorite champ and winning! This is going to suck!"
